坴字的基本解释

坴
lù
大土块。
姓。

坴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》力竹切，入屋，來。］
(1)块状土厐大貌。亦指大土块。
(2)地名用字。也作“陸”。
(3)姓。

坴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　坴； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页226第34
【廣韻】【集韻】?力竹切，音六。土塊坴坴也。一曰高塏爲坴。【前漢·郊祀志】河溢臯坴。　又坴梁，越地。【史記·秦本紀】秦使賈人贅婿伐南越，略取坴梁之地。　陸本作坴。小篆加阜作陸。

Basic explanation of words
坴
lù
Large clods.
name.
坴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Guang Yun" Li Zhu cut, enter the house, come. ]
(1) The large-scale appearance of the blocky soil. Also refers to large clods.
(2) Words used in place names. Also called "Lu".
(3) Last name.
坴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　坴; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 226 34
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Li Zhu cut, sound six. The clods are also pits. One said that Gao Kai is Lai. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi] He Yigao.　The beam is again, and the ground is crossed. [Historical Records·Benji of Qin] The envoy of Qin Jia and his son-in-law made an expedition to Nanyue and took the land of Liangliang.　Lu Ben made it. Xiaozhuan adds Fu for land.
